metadata.title: CVE-2024-47191 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: pam_oath.so in oath-toolkit 2.6.7 through 2.6.11 before 2.6.12 allows rootprivilege escalation because, in the context of PAM code running as root,it mishandles usersfile access, such as by calling fchown in the presenceof a symlink.

criterions.comment: oath-toolkit package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
